Text.Page:
It seems the Kulkari have their own unique chain of command. Those {@LinkCreature:21#5#Crag Stalker Prophets} and {@LinkCreature:21#30#Crag Stalker shamans} over there are like the commanders.

To the prophets and shamans, as well as the combatants under their control, the staves they carry around are holy. If we take their staves, we will effectively eliminate their objects of worship.

Once their faith starts to falter, their will to fight will soon follow.
Look over there! Unrest stewing among the Crag Stalkers, just as we planned! You've done an excellent job.
The best way to break their morale in half is to eliminate the very objects they worship. You should perhaps hurry up.
